original_text: Abimelech chased after him. Gaal and his men ran back to the city. But Abimelech and his men caught and killed many of them before they reached the city gate.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그를 추격하니 그 앞에서 도망하였고 부상하여 엎드러진 자가 많아 성문 입구까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Gaal and his men ran back
caught and killed many of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 많은 사람을 붙잡아 죽였다.

sentences.original_text: before they reached the city gate.
